spec.name: promedios_colmena_dia
spec.query:
from(bucket: "colmena")
  |> range(start: -1d)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "promedios_colmena_hora")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 1d, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> group(columns: ["colmena_id", "_field"])
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({
      _time: now(),
      _measurement: "promedios_colmena_dia",
      _field: r._field,
      _value: r._value,
      colmena_id: r.colmena_id
  }))
  |> to(bucket: "colmena", org: "MoriahMkt")
